channel.title: Help with PWM t4 Servo Object?
channel.description:
could someone please help me to change the inlets of the "pwm t4 servo" object to PB1 and PA5. i am assuming i could copy the code and all into a new object and change the names everywhere? could i just do that? or could someone do it for me to prevent me to mess things up badly?
thanks in advance jens

item.title: Help with PWM t4 Servo Object?
item.dc:creator: @Moutcast Moutcast
item.description:
@Moutcast wrote:

ok thanks i figured it out more or less. first time i modified an object

Read full topic
item.source: Help with PWM t4 Servo Object?
